name: Rogue Runner (itch)
description:
Welcome to Ruckus Force's first project!  
We have here an endless runner set in a post-apocalyptic future.  
SPACE to Jump
ESC to Pause
Thank you for checking out our game!

Credits:
Gerard Aguilar: Unity/C# Developer
Christopher Gonzalez: Unity Developer
Hannah Motegi: Producer
Eduardo Rodriguez : Concept Artist

Music courtesy of:
Avello: Freeze Time
GDOP: Free (Preview)
